Enreg.Label: UNA
Enreg.Details: UNA segment define the characters used as separators and indicators for the interchange

Enreg.Label: UNB
Enreg.Details: This segment is used to start, identify and specify an interchange

Enreg.Label: UNH
Enreg.Details: This segment is used to head, identify and specify a message

Enreg.Label: MID
Enreg.Details: This segment is used to give the reference number of the document and the date of its generation

Enreg.Label: SDT
Enreg.Details: To give details of the seller such as coded or uncoded name and address, contacts

Field.FieldLabel: Internal Id. n° allocated by a partner
Internal Id. No. allocated to a Trading Partner

Enreg.Label: BDT
Enreg.Details: To give details of the buyer such as coded or uncoded name and address, contacts

Field.FieldLabel: Internal Id. n° allocated by a

Enreg.Label: CSG
Enreg.Details: To give details of the consignee such as coded or uncoded name and address, contacts and to provide delivery location details

Field.FieldLabel: Internal Id. n° allocated by a partner

Enreg.Label: PDI
Enreg.Details: To reference to the previous delivery instruction number in which the last schedule number for this article was transmitted

Enreg.Label: SAD
Enreg.Details: To provide additional information regarding the article identified in the preceding ARD segment. It is used to indicate if the new instruction replaces or amends the previous ones or whether it is used as a call-off request

Enreg.Label: DST
Enreg.Details: To allow reconciliation of data necessary for the buyer and seller to have a common understanding of the quantities scheduled/received for the article referred in the ARD segment

Zone.ZoneLabel: Cumulative qty scheduled up to accumulation date

Enreg.Label: PDN
Enreg.Details: To reference dispatch note references received and processed by the consignee for the article referenced in the ARD segment

Enreg.Label: SID
Enreg.Details: Segment giving details to the current and previous delivery-schedules

Field.FieldLabel: Reference to Highest Quantity Previously Scheduled

Enreg.Label: DEL
Enreg.Details: To specify the quantities required with associated dates and times and, if not made in SID segment, the level of commitment

Enreg.Label: UNT
Enreg.Details: This segment is a mandatory UN/ODETTE segment. It must always be the last segment in the message

Zone.ZoneLabel: Number of segments in a message

Enreg.Label: UNZ
Enreg.Details: This segment is a mandatory UN/ODETTE segment. It must always be the last segment in the interchange
